company.name: Physics Wallah
company.description: PW is India’s leading affordable EdTech platform offering courses for NEET, JEE, UPSC and countless competitive exams.
company.mission: Deliver high-quality education at the lowest price in India.

faq.a: PW is an affordable EdTech platform offering online & offline classes for competitive exams in India.
Yes! Many PW courses include free demo lectures and sample chapter tests.
PW offers courses for NEET, JEE, UPSC, GATE, banking, and school-level boards.
PW features highly qualified educators, including Alakh Pandey Sir and other top faculty.
PW courses are among the most affordable, starting from ₹299 to ₹5000 depending on class and exam type.
